Text:
@SoftWarez

All i am doin is sharing..... u may take it any way...
What is "WP" supposed to mean? You should always have either CAM, TS, DVDrip, DVDR, DVDSCR, R5, R6 or whatever in the title, so we know exactly what we're downloading.

WP means "workprint" (if you didn't notice it in the .nfo file).

WP copies may have unfinished scenes and things like that.

@ Softwarez

You're a cunt. Following the guy around, posting the same SILLY ASS shit? What are you, 13?

This is how it works. This is our distribution model. Share. Spread. Impossible to stop. 

Your brand of bullshit, look-at-me, credit for credit's sake single-source detritus is juvenile, counter-productive, and untenable. 

For more, see my other reply to you in this uploader's last comment section. 

Asshole.

---

the quality that is*

audio is a bit screwy, dialogue is on left and music is on right with default settings on your comp.

If u use CCCP (combined community codec pack) you can go into ffdshow audio decoder configuration, go into mixer tab, and set Output speakers config to mono, seems to center the audio so dialogue and music comes from both.  Just remember to set it back to your preference later.
thanks man :D
Great video quality! The watermarks are off to the sides so they don't take away from the watching experience.
BTW If you aren't getting any sound you might need to upgrade your video codec package. I was having the same problem until I did.

My favorite part was the ending, oh FYI when you play the movie on a PS3 the audio for the background music mite be the only thing you hear,without the voices, but if you play it on Xbox 360 you will hear both the audio or background music and the voices
